product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsHoly Hydration! Clean Freak Daily Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty Freee.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Clean Freak Daily Cleanser is a lightly foaming, gentle gel face wash that will help you say bye to dry with a 1% Hyaluronic acid complex that hydrates, even after rinsing, for skin that feels soft, comfy and clean as e.l.f.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle & refreshing daily gel facial cleanserLeaves skin feeling hydrated, soft & comfortableFormulated with 1% Hyaluronic acid complex to hydrate skin, even after rinsingGreat for dry, oily, combination & sensitive skin typese.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productKey Ingredients1% Hyaluronic acid complexFormulated WithoutSulfatesPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanItem 2640210How To UseCreate a gentle lather using a small amount of face cleanser and water, then massage onto skin.Rinse and pat dry.Use cleanser daily, AM and PM, for skin that's clean and hydrated.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Sodium Cocoyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Diglycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Trehalose, Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Polyquaternium-10, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate.Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Create a gentle lather using a small amount of face cleanser and water, then massage onto skin.Rinse and pat dry.Use cleanser daily, AM and PM, for skin that's clean and hydrated.
ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate.Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product

reviews.headline: I am loving this product. I would buy this again!!!
reviews.comments: I have been looking for a new face wash that was less expensive that the one I was using that seemed to keep going up in price every other time I purchased it so I thought I would give the elf Line a try and to my surprise it's great.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: My skin has a tendency towards flaking around my nose yet still breaks out on my chin area.  Also sensitive to any fragrance.  This cleanser is my second step after e.l.f. cleansing balm and it leaves my face feeling clean, refreshed, and hydrated.  Absolutely love it!

reviews.headline: My new fave cleanser
reviews.comments: This is my new go-to cleanser. I love the lather, leaves my skin clean and fresh. I also love the affordable price.

reviews.headline: Okay cleanser, awful smell
reviews.comments: This cleanser is fine, does the job, nothing too notable except I cannot stand the scent. I was surprised there is added fragrance because it smells very chemically/plasticky to me. I'll definitely be switching back to a more gentle, fragrance free cleanser.

reviews.headline: It's an okay product
reviews.comments:
I love e.l.f. so I was excited to try this daily cleanser and it's just alright. I wish I could say I love it but I have noticed some dry patches on my face since switching to this cleanser and I'm not a huge fan of the smell of the product either. 

You only need to use just a drop to get a good lather which is nice. I'll probably continue to use it off and on while using my previous product and just won't repurchase in the future.

reviews.headline: Another Great Product From E.L.F.
reviews.comments: Accidentally used too much the first time. You need a deceptively small amount, but its a great cleanser. I normally double cleanse my face but I didn't even feel the need to do a second wash with this stuff. 10/10

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Love the formula nice and thick, thins out when rubbed with water ,did not cause me to break out or anything .

reviews.headline: Great cruelty-free product!
reviews.comments: Have used ELF products since first being introduced, & this one is great!  I use this gel cleanser @ nite after using another brand's gentle scrub to remove my makeup.  It smells clean & works great!  Highly recommend!  Just need ELF to introduce a gentle scrub!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This cleanser is very hydrating and refreshing. I use it every morning and it wakes me up for work. I love this cleanser!

reviews.headline: Don't fix what's not broken!
reviews.comments: Why!?!?  Elf I've loved your products for so long!! Your other cleanser worked so great, had great ingredients, smelled fresh like coconuts.  This one is horrible!!! Smells like toxic chemicals! Man i am so disappointed.  Welp on to new skin care!

media.headline: Gentle Yet Effective,Cleanser That Actually Works
media.caption: My new fav cleanser

media.headline: Holy Hydration Clean Freak Daily Cleanser Review
media.caption: My Sample has arrived!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this for free from e.l.f. and BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. That being said, I'm reviewing as though I spent my own money on this. 

I have used a gentle cream to foam cleanser from another brand for a few years now. It's about three times the price of this with less product, but I had never found a cheaper option that cleanses as gently and compatibly for a lower price. I'm ecstatic to report that I may now finally be able to spend so much less on a cleanser, because this Holy Hydration! Clean Freak cleanser seems to be working just as well. I've maintained the rest of my skin care and makeup routine and simply replaced the cleanser. My face looks fresh and hydrated after cleansing, ready for serum and moisturizer. My makeup melts away easily, which is a bonus because my old cleanser was lacking in this area. I have not experienced any redness, breakouts, or sensitivity since using this. The bottle is huge, especially at this price point. I admit that I wasn't expecting this quality for this product, but I'm wildly impressed and will probably purchase this when the bottle is empty. Highly recommended.
faceoff_positive.headline: Impressed by this affordable cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've used this for a couple of weeks now and while my face hasn't flared up / get irritated, I wouldn't purchase this cleanser after finishing it. I have oily skin and the consistency of this cleanser is like the Cetaphil cleanser. It's very liquidy and not thick in consistency so it feels like I'm laddering water down hand sanitizer on my face. I prefer a thicker consistency to my cleanser because it gives me the feeling that it's working hard to clear all the dirt off of my face even if it foams up. I will say this does the job but it doesn't really give you a refresh clean feeling. 

This is great for the morning / beginner as it's an easy way in. The way i like to use these type of cleansers that foam is to wet my face and squeeze out a penny size amount and then gently lather across my face and it'd foam up vs putting water in your hand and foaming it like that.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great Foaming Selection But Not a Favorite

rollup.name: Holy Hydration! Clean Freak Daily Cleanser
